statements: SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_event_schedule WHERE notification_sent = TRUE;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01' AND event_date <= '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_description LIKE '%exciting%'
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_event_schedule WHERE notification_sent = FALSE
SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events;
SELECT event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM game_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM game_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN game_events ON notifications.event_id = game_events.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, notification_type, notification_message FROM game_events LEFT JOIN notifications ON game_events.event_id = notifications.event_id ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM game_events
SELECT * FROM event_notifications WHERE notification_status = true
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM event_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Reminder'
SELECT username, email FROM community_engagement WHERE subscription_level >= 2
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_type='tournament' AND event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, notification_message FROM game_events JOIN event_notifications ON game_events.event_id = event_notifications.event_id WHERE event_notifications.notification_status = true
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM community_engagement WHERE subscription_level > 1 ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%exciting%'
SELECT * FROM game_events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_data
SELECT event_name, max_players FROM game_events
SELECT event_date, event_time FROM game_events
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE max_players > 10 ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_data WHERE last_played < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_level DESC;

SELECT event_name, event_date, player_name FROM game_events JOIN event_participation ON game_events.event_id = event_participation.event_id JOIN player_data ON event_participation.player_id = player_data.player_id WHERE participation_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT notification_message, notification_time FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert' ORDER BY notification_time DESC;

SELECT event_name, max_players, COUNT(player_id) AS num_participants FROM game_events JOIN event_participation ON game_events.event_id = event_participation.event_id GROUP BY event_name, max_players HAVING num_participants > 5 ORDER BY num_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, location FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, email_address FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM event_attendance GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM game_events WHERE event_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM game_events JOIN event_participants ON game_events.event_id = event_participants.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_datetime FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_datetime DESC;

SELECT event_name, participant_name, comment_text FROM game_events JOIN event_comments ON game_events.event_id = event_comments.event_id WHERE event_comments.comment_datetime >= '2022-05-01' ORDER BY event_name, participant_name ASC;
